Detailed Description

Simple surface class built to contain basic features of a triangle mesh.

Member Function Documentation

const bool ASCbase::geometry::SimpleTrimeshThree::fail (  )  const [inline]

Check if class has failed -- if it has, this class's use at best will be undefined

bool ASCbase::geometry::SimpleTrimeshThree::get_faces ( const VertAttrib::vi &  central_vert,
const FaceAttrib::vi &  start_face,
std::vector< FaceAttrib::vi > *  faces_out,
const bool  skip_first_prev = false 
) [inline, private]

Get all the faces for the given vertex.

This method does not add the starting face First this method will check all the faces that can be found via the face->next links. If a "null" face is found, it will check all the faces via the face->prev links.

This method will fail if the mesh is of poor quality and all of the faces cannot be found by both next and prev traversal

void SimpleTrimeshThree::initialize_opt ( std::vector< Edge > &  edges  ) 

Compute the energy at each vertex and add to a priority queue based on the estimated change in energy
